food.name: Pierogi
food.description: Dumplings filled with a variety of fillings like potatoes, cheese, meat, or fruit.

food.name: Bigos
food.description: A traditional Polish stew made with sauerkraut, fresh cabbage, and meat.

food.name: Żurek
food.description: A sour rye soup served with sausage and egg.

food.name: Gołąbki
food.description: Cabbage rolls stuffed with rice and meat.

food.name: Placki ziemniaczane
food.description: Polish potato pancakes served with sour cream or applesauce.

food.name: Kielbasa
food.description: Traditional Polish sausage often grilled or served in stews.

food.name: Barszcz
food.description: A beet soup often served with sour cream.

food.name: Makowiec
food.description: A poppy seed roll often enjoyed during holidays.

food.name: Sernik
food.description: A traditional Polish cheesecake made with twaróg cheese.

food.name: Piernik
food.description: A traditional Polish gingerbread often enjoyed during Christmas.
